alert.note: Alert for Ector (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 03 at 1:26AM CDT until October 03 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR CENTRAL ECTOR COUNTY... At 126 AM CDT, Earlier West Odessa Fire Department reported flooding at University at Moss. The thunderstorm is no longer producing rainfall but flooding may continue the next couple of hours so the warning will continue. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Fire Department IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... West Odessa. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
